nameEntry.part: Department of Justice and Attorney General

biogHist.abstract: The Department of Justice and Attorney General took control of Queensland juvenile detention institutions and related records in 2012. Previously the Department of Communities, Child Safety and Disability Services controlled Youth Justice.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Time Out Books, Queensland Government-run Juvenile Detention Institutions (1961 - 2001)

descriptiveNote.p: The Department of Justice and Attorney General controls access to these records. The Department of Communities, Child Safety and Disabilitiy Services holds the records.

descriptiveNote.p: The Department of Justice and Attorney General controls access to the records of the Westbrook Youth Detention Centre.
